name: why? (jonny)
description:
its my first game jam so don't expect much, hopefully i got better over the week, but i only worked on Saturday and last Sunday because of school, its not a big game but i hope it has some charm, well well.

at the end it felt like a school assignment, i was really tired. how do people do it?

music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Kevin_MacLeod/Classical_Sampler/Gymnopedie_No...
